sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Christianity abused by the Church of Rome, and popery shewed to be a corruption of it being an answer to a late printed paper given about by papists : in a letter to a gentleman / by J.W. Williams, John, 1636?-1709.
[2], 21, [1] p.
Printed for Walter Kettilby ..., London : 1679.
Attributed to John Williams. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.). Includes bibliographical references. Letter addressed: To my honoured friend Mr. S.B. Errata: p. [1] at end. Reproduction of original in Bristol Public Library, Bristol, England.
=======

[2], 21, [1] p.
Printed for Walter Kettilby ..., London : 1679.
Attributed to John Williams. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.). Includes bibliographical references. Letter addressed: To my honoured friend Mr. S.B. Errata: p. [1] at end. Reproduction of original in Bristol Public Library, Bristol, England.
